result.purpose: Defines data transfer objects (DTOs) for various types of responses related to AI chat completions, chain configurations, server responses, and RPC handling.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing data transfer objects into separate files based on their specific response types, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/dtos/res.purpose: Defines data transfer objects for AI chat completion responses.
Defines data transfer objects for chain configuration responses.
Defines data transfer objects for server responses and pagination handling.
Defines the RpcResponse structure for handling RPC responses.
